parameter.name: serialPort
parameter.label: Serial Port
parameter.description: Serial Port to use for connecting to the Nuvo amplifier

parameter.name: host
parameter.label: Address
parameter.description: Host Name or IP Address of the machine connected to the Nuvo amplifier (Serial over IP)

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: Port
parameter.description: Communication Port (serial over IP). For IP connection to the Nuvo amplifier. Use port 5006 with MPS4 server.

parameter.name: numZones
parameter.label: Number of Zones
parameter.description: Number of Zones on the amplifier to utilize in the binding (Up to 20 zones when using expansion module)

parameter.name: favoriteLabels
parameter.label: Favorite Labels
parameter.description: A comma separated list of up to 12 label names that are loaded into the 'favorites' channel of each zone

parameter.name: clockSync
parameter.label: Sync Clock On GConcerto
parameter.description: If set to true, the binding will sync the internal clock on the Grand Concerto to match the openHAB host's system clock. The sync job runs at binding startup and once an hour thereafter. The Essentia G has no RTC, so this setting has no effect on that component.
